title: Llega a la cima
custom: Planifiquemos para ajustarnos a tus necesidades

offers.name: MOCK UP
offers.description: Graphic representation of the initial idea that does not include dynamic content. The best possible model of your product, to provide at least part of the functionality of a system and enable testing on users.

offers.name: F. PROTOTYPE
offers.description: Basic and fundamental behavior of the project, excluding generation of dynamic content and server-side/cloud storage. The basic and most efficient model of the system that would give life to your product.

offers.name: MVP
offers.description: Minimum product that allows to represent in a clear and fluid form, the product or service that you offer. It´s a well-built and scalable digital product or service; the first prototype for your business to be anywhere, anytime.
